mapper.select: SELECT x, y, floor from population WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId};
SELECT uuid, floor from population WHERE deviceId = #{deviceId};
SELECT x, y from population WHERE (uuid = #{uuid} and deviceId NOT IN (#{deviceId}));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO population VALUES (#{deviceId}, #{uuid}, #{x}, #{y}, #{floor}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE x=#{x}, y=#{y}, floor=#{floor};
